apparatuswrap.PARAL: 9cd ≈ Manu 5.137cd: triguṇaṃ syād vanasthānāṃ yatīnāṃ tu caturguṇam

apparatuswrap.TR: I shall teach you the purification of food. Listen, pay great attention.

mainwrap.TEXT: bhāgadvayaṃ tu bhuñjīta bhāgam ekaṃ jalaṃ pibet ||5.10||

apparatuswrap.TR: He should eat two units of food and drink one unit of water.
In order to be able to practise breath-control, he should save the remaining fourth.
